english.segment1: There's a time for war. there's a time for peace. a time to live and a time to die. a time to grieve and a time to dance. this time is for you
english.segment2: chorus. ain't no use in looking back, no. keep on plowing straight ahead, yo. nothin' left back in Egypt land. when the big time comes around
english.segment3: there's a time to cry. and a time to laugh. a time for throwing away. there's a time for death and a time for life. now's the time for you
english.segment4: there's a time to run. and a time to stand. a time for looking ahead. there's a time to stay. and a time to go. this time it's for you
english.segment5: repeat chorus. bridge. there's a time for everything. and now's the time to serve the King. there's a time for all to see. and now's the time for you and me
